SEARCH:
模块 com.example.demo
程序包 com.example.demo.controller

类 Control_Main

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.controller.Control_Main
public class Control_Main extends Object
The Control_Main class handles the main user interface of the game, including the buttons for starting the game, opening settings, and viewing control information. It also manages background music, animations, and loading of different UI elements.

  • 字段详细资料

    • controlAnimation

      private Control_Animation controlAnimation
      The controller responsible for managing animations in the game. This object handles the animations for various elements such as the plane, bullets, and enemies.

    • settingsController

      private Control_Setting settingsController
      The controller responsible for managing the settings in the game. This object handles user interactions with the game settings.

    • controlController

      private Control_Control controlController
      The controller responsible for managing user controls in the game. This object handles user interactions related to controls and input configurations.

    • rootPane

      private javafx.scene.layout.StackPane rootPane
      The main root container of the user interface. This container holds all UI components for the main menu and other views.

    • startButton

      private javafx.scene.control.Button startButton
      The button to start the game. This button initiates the game when clicked by the user.

    • controlButton

      private javafx.scene.control.Button controlButton
      The button to open the control settings menu. This button allows the user to configure the game controls.

    • settingsButton

      private javafx.scene.control.Button settingsButton
      The button to open the settings menu. This button allows the user to configure general game settings.

    • animationController

      private javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane animationController
      The AnchorPane that holds the animation controller. This pane is responsible for displaying animations of the game.

    • settingsPane

      private javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane settingsPane
      The settings pane for configuring game settings. This pane contains UI elements related to adjusting the game settings.

    • controlPane

      private javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane controlPane
      The control pane for managing user input controls. This pane contains UI elements related to configuring the game controls.

    • blurEffect

      private final javafx.scene.effect.BoxBlur blurEffect
      The blur effect used for the settings or control panels when active. This effect adds a blur to the background when the user is in the settings or control menus.

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initialization method called automatically by JavaFX. Sets up background music, button actions, and loads animations.

    • initBackgroundMusic

      private void initBackgroundMusic()
      Initializes and plays background music if needed.

    • setupButtonActions

      private void setupButtonActions()
      Sets up actions for buttons (start, control, settings) and adds hover sound effects.

    • loadAnimation

      private void loadAnimation()
      Loads animation into the animation controller pane. If animation is already loaded, it starts the animations.

    • openSettings

      private void openSettings()
      Opens the settings pane and applies a blur effect to the background.

    • openControl

      private void openControl()
      Opens the control pane and applies a blur effect to the background.

    • startGame

      private void startGame()
      Starts the game, releasing any resources and clearing UI components.

    • releaseResources

      private void releaseResources()
      Releases resources and clears UI components before starting the game.

    • stopAndReleaseAnimation

      private void stopAndReleaseAnimation()
      Stops and releases resources associated with the animation.

    • clearSettingsPane

      private void clearSettingsPane()
      Clears the settings pane from the root container.

    • clearControlPane

      private void clearControlPane()
      Clears the control pane from the root container and releases its resources.

    • clearRootPane

      private void clearRootPane()
      Clears all children from the root pane.

    • hideCurrentWindow

      private void hideCurrentWindow()
      Hides the current window (used when starting the game).

    • setupHoverSounds

      private void setupHoverSounds(javafx.scene.control.Button... buttons)
      Adds hover sounds to the specified buttons.
      参数:
      buttons - The buttons to which hover sounds should be added.

    • applyBlurEffectToBackground

      private void applyBlurEffectToBackground()
      Applies a blur effect to all children in the root pane except the settings pane.

    • loadSettingsPane

      private void loadSettingsPane()
      Loads the settings pane if it hasn't been loaded yet.

    • loadControlPane

      private void loadControlPane()
      Loads the control pane if it hasn't been loaded yet.
